value.title: Best tips when working with Power BI dataflows!
value.excerpt: I have been creating quite many dataflows lately and in today's video, I am going to share my best tips on how  to set them up and avoid common issues. value.title: Bulk import data from multiple pages on a website with Power BI Desktop - Power BI Tips & Tricks #04
value.excerpt: Have you come across a website that has data you need but it is presented in multiple pages? Downloading page by page can be frustrating and time consuming. In this short video, I will show you how to iterate multiple pages on a website to import the data using Power BI.  LINK to NFL site: http://www.nfl.com/stats/categorystats?tabSeq=2&offensiveStatisticCategory=TEAM_PASSING&conference=ALL&role=TM&season=2015&seasonType=REG

value.title: Combine data from multiple Google Analytics accounts in one query with Power BI
value.excerpt: You asked me in the comment box a while ago if it was possible to combine data from multiple Google Analytics accounts in just one query and in today's video, we are going to do just that.  The download file is #43, go and grab it in the download center!  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: Create a Datetime column in Power Query/ M language - Download 44

value.title: DAX Fridays! #105: ISINSCOPE
value.excerpt: The DAX function ISINSCOPE, allow us to work with hierarchies in Power BI. In this video I will go through an example on how to do that. This DAX function was introduced in the November 2018 Power BI Desktop Update, so make sure you have that installed if you wan to test it out.  Other resources:  DAX

value.title: DAX Fridays! #11: Using variables in DAX
value.excerpt: Variables are an extremely useful feature in DAX, but perhaps not a well known one. Variables, 1. Make your formulas more readable 2. You can reuse them through your report 3. Can also be tables 4. Are more efficient  Download our Growth dashboard if you want to see the example live:http://curbal.com/blog/the-ultimate-dashboard-to-track-your-website-growth-with-google-analytics-and-power-bi-supercharged-excel
